coreAttributes.authorTag: On the filler cap, slightly raised lettering reads "Official Enforcer Issue, MFD by DSG Forgeworks."
coreAttributes.name: arcane liquid stun gun
coreAttributes.description: The final word in riot control, this weapon uses a water spell to propel a stream of water to conduct arcane lightning at any target its sights. You guess that it could be filled with any liquid if suitably modified.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(bring)] out the stun gun and pull the sling over [npc.her] shoulder. The arcane-enhanced water sloshes around inside as the built-in tank magically fills itself.
coreAttributes.onCriticalHitEffect: #IF !npc2.hasStatusEffect(SE_ARCANE_AROUSAL_LUSTFUL_DISTRACTION) #THEN [##npc2.addStatusEffect(SE_ARCANE_AROUSAL_LUSTFUL_DISTRACTION, 6)] [npc2.Name] [npc2.is] [style.boldLust(feeling the lingering effects of the arcane lightning.)] #ENDIF

hitDescriptions.hitText: Aiming [npc.her] stun gun at [npc2.name], [npc.she] [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger. A jet of water streams towards [npc2.name], followed by a crackling bolt of arcane lightning. [npc2.Name] barely has time to stare with a look of disbelief on [npc2.her] face before succumbing to the effects of the lightning! [npc2.Name] [npc2.verb(shiver)] a bit as the water soaks [npc2.her] [npc2.skinSkin].

missDescriptions.missText: Aiming [npc.her] stun gun at [npc2.name], [npc.she] [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger. A jet of water streams towards [npc2.name], but it goes wide! The water splashes and sparks into a useless puddle on the ground.
